name: Bricks Puzzle Master
description:
Presenting THE Masterpiece of brick breaking game!!

Simple control with refreshing reaction.
All you need is your sense of instinct to aim.
The optimum choice to blow your stress away.
Play now to empty your mind and recharge in minutes.

Enjoy this awesome game for FREE and anywhere!

: Easy to ball control
